geneVariantDescriptions.description: PTCH1 inact mut indicates that this variant results in a loss of function of the Ptch1 protein. However, the specific amino acid change has not been identified.

references.title: External Reference Not Available (N/A)

evidence.efficacyEvidence: In a preclinical study, Glabrescione B inhibited proliferation of mouse medulloblastoma cells harboring a Ptch1 inactivating mutation in culture, and inhibited tumor growth in allograft models (PMID: 25476449).

references.title: Gli1/DNA interaction is a druggable target for Hedgehog-dependent tumors.

evidence.efficacyEvidence: In a Phase II trial (MyPathway), Erivedge (vismodegib) treatment resulted in an objective response of 16.7% (3/18, 3 partial response) in patients with advanced solid tumors harboring PTCH1 loss-of-function mutations (PMID: 29320312; NCT02091141).

references.title: Targeted Therapy for Advanced Solid Tumors on the Basis of Molecular Profiles: Results From MyPathway, an Open-Label, Phase IIa Multiple Basket Study.

evidence.efficacyEvidence: In a Phase II trial (MyPathway), Erivedge (vismodegib) treatment resulted in partial response in a patient with salivary gland cancer harboring a PTCH1 loss-of-function mutation (PMID: 29320312; NCT02091141).

references.title: Targeted Therapy for Advanced Solid Tumors on the Basis of Molecular Profiles: Results From MyPathway, an Open-Label, Phase IIa Multiple Basket Study.

evidence.efficacyEvidence: In a preclinical study, MK-4101 inhibited tumor growth in allograft models of basal cell carcinoma derived from PTCH1 heterozygous knockout mice (PMID: 26960983).

references.title: MK-4101, a Potent Inhibitor of the Hedgehog Pathway, Is Highly Active against Medulloblastoma and Basal Cell Carcinoma.

evidence.efficacyEvidence: In a preclinical study, MK-4101 completely inhibited tumor growth, prevented regrowth after treatment termination, and improved survival in allograft models of medulloblastoma derived from PTCH1 heterozygous knockout mice (PMID: 26960983).

references.title: MK-4101, a Potent Inhibitor of the Hedgehog Pathway, Is Highly Active against Medulloblastoma and Basal Cell Carcinoma.

evidence.efficacyEvidence: In a preclinical study, Erivedge (vismodegib) inhibited tumor growth in allograft models of medulloblastoma derived from PTCH1 heterozygous knockout mice (PMID: 26960983).

references.title: MK-4101, a Potent Inhibitor of the Hedgehog Pathway, Is Highly Active against Medulloblastoma and Basal Cell Carcinoma.

evidence.efficacyEvidence: In a Phase II trial (MyPathway), Erivedge (vismodegib) treatment resulted in partial response in a patient with skin squamous cancer harboring a PTCH1 loss-of-function mutation (PMID: 29320312; NCT02091141).

references.title: Targeted Therapy for Advanced Solid Tumors on the Basis of Molecular Profiles: Results From MyPathway, an Open-Label, Phase IIa Multiple Basket Study.

evidence.efficacyEvidence: In a preclinical study, Trisenox (arsenic trioxide) inhibited survival of tumor cells derived from spontaneous medulloblastoma of heterozygous PTCH1 knockout mice in culture (PMID: 26130651).

references.title: RAS/MAPK Activation Drives Resistance to Smo Inhibition, Metastasis, and Tumor Evolution in Shh Pathway-Dependent Tumors.

evidence.efficacyEvidence: In a preclinical study, PW12 inhibited tumor growth in allograft models of medulloblastoma with heterozygous inactivating mutations in PTCH1 and TP53 and over expression of MYCN (PMID: 26029667).

molecularProfile.profileName: MYCN over exp PTCH1 inact mut TP53 inact mut

references.title: Downregulation of MYCN through PI3K Inhibition in Mouse Models of Pediatric Neural Cancer.

evidence.efficacyEvidence: In a preclinical study, Erivedge (vismodegib) inhibited cell growth, induced apoptosis in tumor cells derived from spontaneous medulloblastoma of heterozygous PTCH1 knockout mice which also harbored TP53 mutations in culture (PMID: 26130651).

references.title: RAS/MAPK Activation Drives Resistance to Smo Inhibition, Metastasis, and Tumor Evolution in Shh Pathway-Dependent Tumors.

evidence.efficacyEvidence: In a preclinical study, Odomzo (sonidegib) inhibited cell growth, induced apoptosis in tumor cells derived from spontaneous medulloblastoma of heterozygous PTCH1 knockout mice which also harbored TP53 mutations in culture, and suppressed tumor growth in xenograft models (PMID: 26130651).

references.title: RAS/MAPK Activation Drives Resistance to Smo Inhibition, Metastasis, and Tumor Evolution in Shh Pathway-Dependent Tumors.

evidence.efficacyEvidence: In a preclinical study, LEQ506 inhibited cell growth, induced apoptosis in tumor cells derived from spontaneous medulloblastoma of heterozygous PTCH1 knockout mice which also harbored TP53 mutations in culture (PMID: 26130651).

references.title: RAS/MAPK Activation Drives Resistance to Smo Inhibition, Metastasis, and Tumor Evolution in Shh Pathway-Dependent Tumors.

evidence.efficacyEvidence: In a preclinical study, Odomzo (sonidegib) inhibited cell growth, induced apoptosis in tumor cells derived from spontaneous medulloblastoma of heterozygous PTCH1 knockout mice which also harbored TP53 over expression in culture (PMID: 26130651).
